title: Website Login Failure
description: Users are unable to log in to their accounts, receiving a '500 Internal Server Error'. Issue started around 9 AM.

title: Payment Gateway Error
description: Credit card payments are failing with the error message 'Transaction Declined'. PayPal is working fine.

title: Mobile App Crashing on iOS
description: The app crashes immediately upon opening on devices running iOS 17. Android version is unaffected.

title: Incorrect Product Description
description: The description for product SKU #12345 is showing details for a different item.

title: Cannot Reset Password
description: The 'Forgot Password' link sends an email, but the reset link inside leads to a 404 page.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: The main user dashboard is taking over 30 seconds to load all the widgets.

title: Invoice PDF Download Fails
description: Clicking the 'Download PDF' button for invoices results in a corrupted file.

title: Search Function Not Returning Results
description: Using the main search bar on the homepage returns no results for any query.

title: Typo on the About Us Page
description: There is a spelling mistake in the second paragraph of the 'About Us' section.

title: Email Notifications Not Being Sent
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for new messages or updates.

title: Broken Image Links on Homepage
description: Several product images on the main page are not loading and show a broken link icon.

title: User Profile Picture Upload Fails
description: Attempting to upload a new profile picture results in an 'Upload Failed' error with no specific reason.

title: Incorrect Shipping Fee Calculation
description: The shipping fee for international orders is being calculated as zero, which is incorrect.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: A user has requested the implementation of a dark mode theme for the website to reduce eye strain.

title: Mobile Responsive Issue in Cart
description: The shopping cart page does not display correctly on mobile devices; buttons are overlapping.
